title: Château Planckaert
overview: The Planckaert family takes you on their wild dream at Château Planckaert. Paterfamilias Eddy always wanted to start a charming chambre d'hôtes in France. To realize that dream, the close-knit family bought a castle. There's one problem, though: there's still a lot of work to do... Château Planckaert follows the family through their most intricate challenge to turn a burnt-out castle in France into a beautiful chambre d'hôtes. This warm series tells a story about dreams and hopes, daring and failure, guts and respect, and the unbreakable bond within a family.
